em++ -g -arch arm64 -isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX14.4.sdk -mmacosx-version-min=14.0 -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names -s USE_WEBGPU=1 -s WASM=1 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=0 -s ASSERTIONS=2 -s SAFE_HEAP=1 -s STACK_OVERFLOW_CHECK=2 -s DEMANGLE_SUPPORT=1 -s DISABLE_EXCEPTION_CATCHING=0 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=[_onImageReceived,_malloc,_free] -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=[ccall,cwrap,stackAlloc,stackSave,stackRestore] -pthread -s PTHREAD_POOL_SIZE=10 -s FULL_ES3=1 -gsource-map --source-map-base http://localhost:8000/ --no-heap-copy CMakeFiles/index.dir/main.cpp.o -o index
